subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The 16-year-old Lexi Thompson shot a five-under-par 67 in the Navistar Classic in Prattville, Ala., and is in position to become the youngest player to win an L.P.G.A. tournament.
snippet: The 16-year-old Lexi Thompson shot a five-under-par 67 in the Navistar Classic in Prattville, Ala., and is in position to become the youngest player to win an L.P.G.A. tournament.
